application.ref: A machine learning software for extracting materials and their properties from scientific literature.

p.s: We carried out the resistivity measurement using the fresh ͑as-cleaved͒ surface of the K 0.8 Fe 2 Se 2 crystal and observed a high T c onset of 33 K.

An outstand- ing example is the pressure effect of FeSe; the T c shows a huge increase from 13 to 37 K under 4-6 GPa 10-13 and the large enhancement of T c in FeSe is strongly related to the change in the anion height.
